title: original documents submission date postponed
content: the date to submit has been postponed to Aug 5

comments.body:
So 90% confirmed that classes start in aug end only
(They usually start august 26th only for previous years)
Wait we already gave during admission right?
nah bro, see [pes.edu](http://pes.edu) website to check which documents to submit

Is this date only for btech students or is it for PG courses as well?
